radiographic_examinations.findings: No dilated loops of small large bowel within the abdomen. There is a large stool burden in the colon. Note is made of surgical clips in the left pelvis. Mild thoracolumbar levoscoliosis and multilevel spinal degenerative changes. Reticular opacities in the bilateral lung bases.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Previously seen colonic distention on abdominal radiographs has resolved.
